scripts.build:backend: npm install --prefix backend --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build --prefix backend && npm run migrate:dev --prefix backend
scripts.build:frontend: npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.build:core: npm install --prefix core && npm run build --prefix core
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:core
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:core"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:core"
